title: Noam Chomsky on Popular Uprisings in the Middle East. An Extended Interview on Democracy Now! 1 of 6
description:
DemocracyNow.org - Watch Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jyrxmGbd7eA -
Democracy Now! speaks to MIT Professor Noam Chomsky in an extended interview about what these popular uprisings means for the future of the Middle East and U.S. foreign policy in the region, how U.S. fear of the Muslim Brotherhood is really fear of democracy in the Arab world, and what the Egyptian protests mean for people in the United States.

Chomsky links the U.S. military industrial complex to U.S. foreign policy in the Middle East.

For the video/audio podcast, transcript, and for complete coverage of the protests in Egypt, visit http://www.DemocracyNow.org.
